title: Looks like a lot of other fonts, but different.
author: mindjello creative

comments.content:
It must be **[Aller (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122200/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/aller-typo/)** by Marc Weymann [Dalton Maag, 2010]  
There is also a limited free license on [Font Squirrel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122200/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Aller).
Brilliant! Thank you, that's exactly the font :D
